channel.title: Jolt Environment 1.0.6000 [x86_x64] GOLD
channel.description:
[b]Jolt Environment is a project to prove that Java isn't the only programming language that you can create emulators in (at least for runescape). Provides a majority of features that are very important to server standards, such as x64/x86 support, multi-threading, stability, and much more.
I recommend this framework for people who are looking for a clean, stable BASE.[/b]
[U][B][size=12pt]Jolt Environment: RuneScape Emulator[/size][/B][/U]
Jolt Environment is a powerful RuneScape emulator. Assembled in Microsoft's .NET Framework, it is powered by MySQL database storage and Ion database storage. It is also a user friendly environment for the simpler users who don't have quite the knowledge yet. Jolt Environment is an open-source project currently being devoloped by AJ Ravindiran (TheAj) and Matthew Palmer (Itz Matthew ♥). Under the GNU License agreement, the project files are free for distribution and devoloping. It is required that you do not remove the banner in the source files to show support for the original devlopers.
Information: - Written in C# (.NET Framework, CLR 4.0) - RuneScape 508 version - Uses MySQL database storage (w/ Ion)
[U][B][SIZE="4"]Latest Version[/SIZE][/B][/U] Version: 1.0.6000 GOLD (Stable) Date: March 1st 2010
[img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/732/consoleq.png[/img]
[img]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/1121/ragea.png[/img]
[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/2524/headas.png[/img]
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/9066/equipment.png[/img]
[img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/8998/npcai.png[/img]
[img]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/2614/clanchat.png[/img]
[img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/7978/friendsm.png[/img]
[U][B]Requirements[/B][/U]
[IMG]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/3476/requirements.png[/img]
[U][B]Latest Features:[/B][/COLOR][/U] - [URL=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=mw4a44&s=6]Account Creation via client[/URL] - Character Saving/Loading (via MySQL serialization) - Ground Objects - Ground Items (with manager for managing character specific, and global items). - Ground Items spawns (loaded via mysql database). - Full Character setup - Banking - Inventory - Equipment - Equipment Bonuses - System updating (option to shut down or restart) [URL=http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/8998/npcai.png]- NPC rendering[/URL] - NPC spawning via mysql - NPC Speech (Speeches per npc spawn loaded via mysql) - NPC Walking (TRUE walking, it walks multiple squares, unlike rs2hd/pali where it only moves 1 square per random walk) - Many other small features (too much to list) - All-round source fixes - Stability improvements
And more
---------------------------------------------------- [B]Download:[/B] [url=http://jolte.codeplex.com/releases/view/41192]http://jolte.codeplex.com/releases/view/41192[/url] ----------------------------------------------------
[B]How do i setup jolt?[/B] 1. Download [URL=http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=a9ef9a95-58d2-4e51-a4b7-bea3cc6962cb&displaylang=en]Microsoft's .NET 4.0 Framework[/URL] and install. 2. Download [URL=http://www.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/]MySQL[/URL] and install. 3. Import database from /jolt/sql/runescapedb.sql to the MySQL database. 4. Change connection details (of gameserver and database server) in /data/runeScape.ini 5. Run server.
[B]How do i create an account?[/B] You can use the client's "Create Account" function to create accounts.
-----------------
[B]BUG FIX #1:[/B]
Go to RuneScape\Communication\Login\Handlers\AccountPasswordProtocolHandler.cs and find: [code]p.Skip(4); // RSA Encrpytion.[/code]
change with:
[code]while (p.Peek() != 1) { p.Skip(1); }[/code]

item.title: Jolt Environment 1.0.6000 [x86_x64] GOLD
item.dc:creator: @TheAJ TheAJ
item.description:
@TheAJ wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:6, topic:347840”][quote author=TheAJ link=topic=444220.msg3261919#msg3261919 date=1278557725]
508
[/quote]

Credits?[/quote]

The framework was written by me from scratch.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:9, topic:347840”][quote author=TheAJ link=topic=444220.msg3261668#msg3261668 date=1278546330]
to prove that Java isn’t the only programming language that you can create emulators
[/quote]

There is a C++ one too, and runescape uses “Runescript” for their servers. (C++/Java). Don’t know where you got the idea that it was -.-[/quote]

Not exactly what I meant, as far as im aware, I don’t see any ongoing development from servers (for runescape, atleast) written in any other language than Java. I’m not trying to get people to migrate languages, I personally use Java aswell.

EDIT:
Picture of 15 days of uptime without crashing/errors, showing stability

Read full topic

to prove that Java isn’t the only programming language that you can create emulators

There is a C++ one too, and runescape uses “Runescript” for their servers. (C++/Java). Don’t know where you got the idea that it was -.-
[/quote]So I’m guessing that you’ve seen their server source? Mind leaking?

From everything around on the internet, (word of the mouth directly from some employee’s) they use RuneScript. After doing research, I have come to the conclusion that it is C++/Java mixed.[/quote]
It’s true actually.
